::Zardus::

Zardus sighs, listening to the comm. For a second he was tempted to 
turn the defences on this arrogant bot, but he had a situation inside 
the base and didn't really want to have to pay attention to what was 
happening outside.

"There's battle in the base currently," he says cooly over the 
comm, "Well, about to be battle. I can't currently lower the shields."






--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Prodigey child" <icedemon101@h...> wrote:
> [I did not know that the shields were up I shall repost.]
> 
> Dark Angel/MegaBot/Omega Boost
> 
> 
> 
> As Megabot and Omega Boost were waiting for the shields to go down. 
they saw 
> someone flying in the distance. Dark Angel flew up and looked at 
them.
> 
> 
> Dark Angel:
> 
> 
> "I see Zardus lets any scum join. [Dark Angel opens a com to 
Zardus.]
> LET ME IN."
